name: RevIndy
description: Kick off the greatest month in racing with Methodist Health Foundationâ€™s Rev at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway
author: DrnLrmr

scripts.start: npm run-script; concurrently "webpack --env=dev --progress --profile --colors; webpack-dev-server --env=dev" "bundle exec jekyll serve"
scripts.build: npm run-script; cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --env=prod --progress --profile --colors; webpack --env=optim  --progress --profile --colors; JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build --incremental
scripts.build:pwa: npm run-script; cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --env=pwa --progress --profile --colors; webpack --env=optim  --progress --profile --colors; JEKYLL_ENV=pwa bundle exec jekyll build --incremental; sw-precache --config=config/sw.config.js --verbose
